name: revon-csms
description: REVON Charging Station Management System - OCPP 1.6J Implementation

scripts.dev: npm run clean:ports && concurrently -n "GATEWAY,CPANEL" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:cpanel"
scripts.dev:cpanel: npm run wait:gateway && cd CPANEL && cross-env PORT=3003 npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run clean:ports && concurrently -n "GATEWAY,CPANEL" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:cpanel"
scripts.start:cpanel: npm run wait:gateway && cd CPANEL && cross-env PORT=3003 npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:cpanel
scripts.prod: npm run clean:ports && concurrently -n "GATEWAY,CPANEL-PREVIEW" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run prod:gateway" "npm run prod:cpanel"
scripts.prod:cpanel: npm run wait:gateway && cd CPANEL && cross-env PORT=3003 npm run preview
scripts.migrate: cd OCPP_GATEWAY && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:deploy: cd OCPP_GATEWAY && npx prisma migrate deploy

author: RevonTech
